name: [Shared] REST API: call *is_alive* endpoint
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)

creator: admin
parameterized_form:

postprocessing:
one_element_list = len(results["result"]) == 1
has_washington = results["result"][0]["name"] == "Washington"
results["success"] = one_element_list and has_washington

name: [GET Endpoints query and token] Query Device - OS EOS
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})

multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
postprocessing:
results["success"] = all(
  device["operating_system" ] == "EOS"
  for device in results["result"]
)

name: [POST Endpoint search] First 5 devices
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
postprocessing:
results["success"] = (
  len(results["result"]) == 5
  and all(
    device["ip_address"] == "192.168.56.51"
    and " Command: show running-config" in device["configuration"]
    for device in results["result"]
))

name: [POST Endpoint search] Devices with i
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
postprocessing:
chicago_pool = fetch("pool", name="Devices with i including networks")
results["success"] = len(chicago_pool.devices) == len(results["result"])

name: [POST Endpoint search] Configuration with regex TRAFFIC-dd
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
postprocessing:
all_devices = len(results["result"]) == 14
all_matches = all(
  device["configuration_matches"] == [
    "L19: vrf instance CUSTOMER-TRAFFIC-28",
    "L32: no ip routing vrf CUSTOMER-TRAFFIC-28"
  ] for device in results["result"]
)
results["success"] = all_devices and all_matches
